subject: Mergers, Acquisitions and Divestitures
Baseball
lead_paragraph: Six weeks ago, the Mets announced that they had agreed to sell a minority stake to David Einhorn, which would give the team a sorely need infusion of cash.
snippet: Six weeks ago, the Mets announced that they had agreed to sell a minority stake to David Einhorn, which would give the team a sorely need infusion of cash.
